track.name: Turning Tables
comments: adele during the making of this song:  (ﾉ °益°)ﾉ 彡 ┻━┻
Wow. I can't believe I waited so long to listen to Adele.

Of all the extremely popular singers today, the one who stands out as genuine is Adele...singing from the heart, from her soul, all of it personal. Keep the rest. The other really fine singers aren't getting the attention they deserve. Missy Higgins, Anna Nalick, A Fine Frenzy, Ingrid Michaelson, and so many others that are barely heard except here on LFM.
An amazing singer, but I only like this song. It's so beautiful, lyrically and melodically. Her others are just too dramatic, depressing or make me cry.
Voice to send chills down your spine..

INcredible! 
Adele you are great!
soulful voice
I've lived a hundred storms to leave you, as hard as you try, no I will never be knocked down <3
great artist , best song , not so popular !!!
